message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a fantastic [product name] that I think you'd really appreciate. I'm asking for $10000 for it, but I'm open to discussing a fair price.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but $10000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $9000?
